content: three step scrunchie m o o n y x s a r a h this is my version of the very easy to make crochet scrunchie you need to know how to make a slip knot slip_stitch single_crochet half double and double_crochet no counting stitches because you can adjust this pattern to fit any hair tie this project is easy and quick to make and you can use up your scrap yarn as well i used 13g of yarn for the scrunchie shown you can use any type of yarn for this project + the recommended hook size for your yarn the yarn i used is listed under the materials section of this pattern all you need is a hair tie and the yarn + hook of your choice measurements this pattern is completely adjustable depending on the size of your hairtie and yarn your stitch count will vary materials yarn hobbii metallico in color 11 medium hooks 4 50mm notions scissors tapestry needle abbreviations chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet single_crochet = single_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch by moonyxsarah do not redistribute this pattern in its original or changed form pattern round 1 make a slip knot around your hook and single_crochet around your hair tie note i like to keep my single_crochet close together so the hair tie doesn t show through + the scrunchie gets more volume round 2 chain 3 double_crochet into every single_crochet slip_stitch into chain round 3 chain 2 half_double_crochet into every double_crochet slip_stitch into chain finishing cut the yarn and weave in the ends by moonyxsarah
